ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmub1.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_subgsubm | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_lsmub2x | |- ( ( T e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> U C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> U C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
